body_html:
Seems that you might not have cloned the protobuf submodule? When you cloned the tensorflow repository, did you add the --recurse-submodules flag?

Try running git submodule update --init in the repository then building again.

Edit: typo in git submodule command
body_text:
Seems that you might not have cloned the protobuf submodule? When you cloned the tensorflow repository, did you add the --recurse-submodules flag?
Try running git submodule update  --init in the repository then building again.
Edit: typo in git submodule command
body:
Seems that you might not have cloned the `protobuf` submodule? When you cloned the tensorflow repository, did you add the `--recurse-submodules` flag?

Try running `git submodule update  --init` in the repository then building again.

Edit: typo in git submodule command
